Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Constructor that declares and intializes the number of decks to 1.
      Deck(int numberOfDecks)
      Creates or constructs a deck of cards by pushing name of each card and its value into a stack of cards and then shuffles the cards.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Stack<Card> cards()
      Returns a deck of cards.
      void dealCard(Player p)
      Deals the top card of the deck to the player.
      Card pop()
      Removes and returns the top card in the deck of cards.
      Deck shuffle()
      Shuffles a deck of cards.
